attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned having been denied a say on the European Union and in an expression of condemnation of Government Policies that have seriously damaged our Nation State, Culture, and National well-being, do hereby register a Vote of No Confidence in the Government 

Furtherto, we call upon the Government to undertake to provide the British People with Direct Democracy, that is, the Right of Referenda on all major issues that affect our National Sovereignty, Rights and Freedoms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
